meanings.sent1: I need to houseclean my room before my friends come over.
meanings.sent2: Every Saturday, I houseclean the entire house from top to bottom.
meanings.sent3: After a long day at work, I finally found the energy to houseclean the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: She decided to houseclean her mind of negative thoughts and focus on the positive.
meanings.sent5: The professional cleaners were hired to houseclean the mansion before the big event.

meanings.definition: The act of cleaning a house.
meanings.sent1: Houseclean can be a tiring but rewarding task.
meanings.sent2: My mom always does a thorough houseclean before the holidays.
meanings.sent3: The houseclean after the party revealed many lost items under the furniture.
meanings.sent4: The annual spring houseclean is a tradition in our family.
meanings.sent5: The houseclean of the old abandoned house was a daunting challenge for the volunteers.
